title: Natural Bridges National Monument: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park        Natural Bridges National Monument was designated the world's first international dark sky park in 2007. NPS Photo by Jacob W. Frank   Â     Stay up to date with the latest park News, see news releases, and join the park's online communities.    In Photos & Multimedia, you can browse through a Natural Bridges photo gallery.   History & Culture tells the stories of people who have lived in and visited Natural Bridges for generations.   In Nature, learn about the park's plant and animal life, geology, night skies, ecosystems, and other natural features.     Education is the place for teachers to plan a field trip and find lesson plans.    Find activities for Kids & Youth to do during your visit to the park.    In Management, learn about park planning, statistics, and laws and policies.
